description.intro: I’m Guillermo Illanes, a Full-Stack Software Developer.
description.details: I’m a Software Developer based in Argentina with a passion for creating efficient, user-friendly, and visually appealing digital solutions. I have experience building both static and dynamic websites tailored to a variety of projects, blending functionality with design. Currently, I am pursuing a degree in Software Development, continuously expanding my knowledge in programming languages, frameworks, and modern development practices to stay ahead in this ever-evolving field.

list.title: Design Trends
list.description: Keeping up with the latest design trends for modern web experiences.

list.description: Crafting responsive websites using cutting-edge technologies.
